ygData.subject: Strange rune
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, in my travel i have come across a strange rune. it s 3 pieces of a broken rune. if i cast identify on it, it says Rune of Dwarf (bottom), and Rune of Dwarf
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,
in my travel i have come across a strange rune. it's 3 pieces of a
broken rune. if i cast identify on it, it says Rune of Dwarf (bottom), and
Rune of Dwarf (Middle). i'm still searching for the top piece. i wonder
which spell the rune of dwarf is used for and how to repair the rune ( maybe
hit combine in the lexicon?). i've found those 2 rune on the evil eye in
runnyeye ( not in beholder). Anyone got information on this?


Gydgith Lightweaver, Bristlebane
